name: Forest (Rymdlingen)
description:
This text adventure is the first part of a story about a bear who just woke up from winter sleep, this is a story about finding yourself and going on adventures.

This game was made as a part of learning programming, game development and game design at The Indie Quest, a indie game development school at Spelkollektivet in Sweden. Web build made with .NET Console.js.

You play by typing in commands to tell the game what you want to do, there is instructions in the beginning of the game and you can read them again by entering 'help' as a command. I suggest having pen and paper available when you play, it's both fun and useful to draw a map of all the locations you go to.

If you get stuck and can't figure out what to do next or just want to chat with me about the game or anything, don't hesitate to contact me! The easiest way to get in contact with me is either here in the comments or on twitter, I'm Rymdlingen over there too.
